segments.text: Excuse me , Sir , you are not supposed to smoke here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your seat is in the non-smoking section , so please refrain from smoking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see , since I'm a heavy smoker . May I change my seat ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then I'll try to find a seat in the smoking section . One moment . please.Thank you for waiting . I found a seat in the smoking section for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , did you ? Thanks a lot .
segments.speaker: S2
